DOC.brief_summary: Participation in one of the three interventions psychoeducation by professionals, psychoeducation by peer-moderators, or video-education can reduce the rehospitalisation rate of patients with schizophrenia compared to a control group.
DOC.brief_title: How Can Rehospitalisations of Patients With Schizophrenia be Avoided? A Comparison Between Different Compliance Programs
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder (ICD10) Age 18 to 67 years Hospitalised or treated in day care clinic More than 12 months of hospitalisation within the last two years Substancedependency (principal diagnosis) Mental retardation ICD10 Chapter F7079 Fluency of German language not given
